name: Node CI

on: [push, workflow_dispatch]

jobs:
  build:
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest

    steps:
    - uses: actions/checkout@v3
    - name: Install Node.js
      uses: actions/setup-node@v3
      with:
        node-version: '16.x'
    - name: Install npm dependencies
      run: npm install
    - name: Run build task
      run: npm run build --if-present
    - name: Setup SSH
      run: |
          env
          mkdir -p ~/.ssh
          echo "${{ secrets.SSH_PRIVATE_KEY }}" > ~/.ssh/id_rsa
          chmod 600 ~/.ssh/id_rsa
          ssh-keyscan -p 22 ${{ secrets.SSH_IP }} >> ~/.ssh/known_hosts
          sudo apt-get install sshpass
      - name: copy builds to server
        run: |
          sshpass -p '${{ secrets.RASSWORD }}' ssh -v -o StrictHostKeyChecking=no ${{ secrets.USER }}@${{ secrets.HOST }} <<'ENDSSH'
          cd ${{ secrets.APP_PATH }}
          git pull
          docker stop ${{ secrets.APP_NAME }}
          docker system prune -f
          export ${{ secrets.API_KEY_NAME }}=${{ secrets.API_KEY }}
          make deploy_headless
          ENDSSH
